You are given a line of $n$ cells ($2 \le n \le 100,000$).  Each cell may contain one or more tanks.  You can drop bombs on any cell, destroying all tanks in that cell.

When a tank is hit for the first time, it moves to an adjacent cell (tanks in cell $n$ can only move to cell $n-1$, and tanks in cell $1$ can only move to cell $2$).  A tank that is hit a second time is destroyed and does not move.

Find the minimum number of bombs needed to destroy all the tanks.  Also, provide a sequence of cells where you should drop the bombs.

You are given a line of cells.  Each cell may contain an unknown number of objects. Dropping a bomb on a cell destroys all objects in that cell.  

Objects, when hit for the first time, move to an adjacent cell. They only move once.  

Find the minimum number of bombs needed to destroy all objects.
